definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: ] fatness;—cstr. [[וּמִשְׁטַן]] [[בְּשָׁרוֹ יֵרָוֶה]] Is 17:14 (fig.); pl. concr.: stout, vigorous, ones, sf. [[מִשְׁמַנָּיו]] Is 10:16 (opp. [[רָווֹן]] on form v. Ges:§ 93 pp), [[מִשְׁמַנֵּיהֶם]] Ps 78:31; = fertile spots, cstr. [[מִשְׁמַנֵּי]] [[מְדִינָה]] Da 11:24. Cf. also 1Sa 15:9, v. [[מִשְׁנֶה]]
